http://example.org/posts/the-state-off-the-home-lab-2023/ Upgrading My Workflow For those who don’t know me, I love tinkering with hardware and software. I am also the type of person who will do something a hundred times before deciding on the best strategy for dealing with a given problem. I only just finished my undergraduate studies for cybersecurity, so for the last year or so my home lab was the last thing I was allocating time to.
